title: Synthesis of Sodium Difluoro-oxalate Borate Based Hybrid Electrolyte Salts with Enhancing Interfacial Properties of NaNi0.3Fe0.4Mn0.3O2 Cathode
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00118D, Paper
Jia Zhang, Jianwei Li, Feng Guo Jia, huaiyou wang, Min Wang
Sodium difluoro-oxalate borate (NaODFB) stands out as a highly promising sodium salt and an influential additive in sodium-ion battery electrolytes. However, the impediments associated with the prevailing synthesis methodology, notably...
